pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:1.3.1: According to Sp.2.604 this means the bean curries should make up one quarter of the food: Samasūpako nāma yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:1.5: The punctuation of the Mahāsaṅgīti edition has been corrected here so as to agree with sekhiya 34, Bu Sk 34:1.6. The text mistakenly had hatthahāriyo in the next sentence.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:1.13: According to the Kaṅkhāvitaraṇī commentary this means any curries apart from bean curry: ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṁ avasesā sabbā pi sūpeyyabyañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hoti. My translation, however, is based on the fact that all other foods too are excluded.
